00047 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048 #define EEPROM_ADDRESS (0x61)
00049 
00050 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 void I2CS_EEPROMsim_Init(void);
00052 void I2CM_Init (void);
00053 u32 I2CM_BufferRead(u16 dev, u8 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count);
00054 u32 I2CM_BufferWrite(u16 dev, u8 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count);
00055 void EEPROM_WriteReadTest(void);
00056 
00057 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00058 uc8 TestData[16] = {0x0, 0x1, 0x2, 0x3, 0x4, 0x5, 0x6, 0x7, 0x8, 0x9, 0x0A, 0xB, 0xC, 0xD, 0xE, 0xF};
00059 u8 ReadBuffer[16];
00060 
00061 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00062 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00063   * @brief  Main program.
00064   * @retval None
00065   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00066 int main(void)
00067 {
00068   /* Initialize LED1 & LED2 on HT32 board                                                                   */
00069   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00070   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00071 
00072   /*Init Key 1                                                                                              */
00073   HT32F_DVB_PBInit(BUTTON_KEY1, BUTTON_MODE_GPIO);
00074 
00075 #ifdef LOOP_BACK
00076   /* Configure I2C Slave as an EEPROM simulation                                                            */
00077   I2CS_EEPROMsim_Init();
00078 
00079   /* Configure I2C Master                                                                                   */
00080   I2CM_Init();
00081 
00082   EEPROM_WriteReadTest();
00083 
00084 #else
00085   /* Read the Key1 state to select either I2C master or EEPROM function                                     */
00086   if (!HT32F_DVB_PBGetState(BUTTON_KEY1))
00087   {
00088     /* Configure I2C Slave as an EEPROM simulation                                                          */
00089     I2CS_EEPROMsim_Init();
00090   }
00091   else
00092   {
00093     /* Configure I2C Master                                                                                 */
00094     I2CM_Init();
00095 
00096     EEPROM_WriteReadTest();
00097   }
00098 #endif
00099 
00100   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00101 
00102   /* Infinite loop                                                                                          */
00103   while (1);
00104 }
00105 
00106 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00107  * @brief   This function is used to simulation EEPROM.
00108  * @retval  None
00109  ************************************************************************************************************/
00110 void I2CS_EEPROMsim_Init(void)
00111 {
00112   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00113     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00114     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00115     HTCFG_I2C_EEPROM_CLK(CKCUClock)   = 1;
00116     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00117   }
00118 
00119   /* Configure SDA and SCL to I2C1 mode                                                                     */
00120   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_EEPROM_SCL_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_EEPROM_SCL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00121   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_EEPROM_SDA_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_EEPROM_SDA_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00122 
00123 
00124   { /* EEPROM configuration                                                                                 */
00125 
00126     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00127        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00128        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00129     */
00130     I2C_InitTypeDef I2C_InitStructure;
00131 
00132     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall = DISABLE;
00133     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode = I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT;
00134     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge = ENABLE;
00135     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress = EEPROM_ADDRESS;
00136     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Speed = 400000;
00137     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_SpeedOffset = 0;
00138     I2C_Init(HTCFG_I2C_EEPROM_PORT, &I2C_InitStructure);
00139   }
00140 
00141   /* Enable EEPROM interrupts                                                                               */
00142   I2C_IntConfig(HTCFG_I2C_EEPROM_PORT, I2C_INT_ADRS | I2C_INT_RXDNE | I2C_INT_TXDE | I2C_INT_RXNACK | I2C_INT_STO, ENABLE);
00143 
00144   /*Enable NVIC EEPROM interrupt                                                                            */
00145   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_I2C_EEPROM_IRQn);
00146 
00147   /* Enable EEPROM                                                                                          */
00148   I2C_Cmd(HTCFG_I2C_EEPROM_PORT, ENABLE);
00149 }
00150 
00151 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00152  * @brief   This function is used to init the I2C master.
00153  * @retval  None
00154  ************************************************************************************************************/
00155 void I2CM_Init(void)
00156 {
00157   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00158     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00159     HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_CLK(CKCUClock) = 1;
00160     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO              = 1;
00161     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00162   }
00163 
00164   /* Configure AFIO pins as I2C mode                                                                        */
00165   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SCL_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SCL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00166   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SDA_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SDA_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00167 
00168   { /* I2C configuration                                                                                      */
00169 
00170     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00171        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00172        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00173     */
00174     I2C_InitTypeDef  I2C_InitStructure;
00175 
00176     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall     = DISABLE;
00177     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode  = I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT;
00178     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge     = DISABLE;
00179     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress      = 0x7F;
00180     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Speed           = 400000;
00181     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_SpeedOffset     = 0;
00182     I2C_Init(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, &I2C_InitStructure);
00183   }
00184 
00185   /* Enable I2C interrupts                                                                                  */
00186   I2C_IntConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_INT_STA | I2C_INT_ADRS | I2C_INT_RXDNE | I2C_INT_TXDE
00187                     | I2C_INT_ARBLOS | I2C_INT_RXNACK | I2C_INT_BUSERR | I2C_INT_TOUT , ENABLE);
00188 
00189   /* Enable NVIC I2C interrupt                                                                              */
00190   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_IRQn);
00191 
00192   /* Enable I2C                                                                                             */
00193   I2C_Cmd(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, ENABLE);
00194 }
00195 
00196 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00197  * @brief   I2C master read data from I2C slave.
00198  * @retval  None
00199  ************************************************************************************************************/
00200 u32 I2CM_BufferRead(u16 dev, u8 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count)
00201 {
00202   I2CM_Transfer.RegAddr = word_addr;
00203   I2CM_Transfer.Buffer      = data;
00204   I2CM_Transfer.Length      = count;
00205   I2CM_Transfer.Counter     = 0;
00206   I2CM_Transfer.Direction   = I2CM_DIRECTION_IN;
00207   I2CM_Transfer.DevAddr     = dev;
00208   I2CM_Transfer.Locked      = TRUE;
00209   I2CM_Transfer.RetryDownCounter = I2CM_BUS_MAX_RETRY;
00210 
00211   /* Send I2C START                                                                                         */
00212   I2C_TargetAddressConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2CM_Transfer.DevAddr, I2C_MASTER_WRITE);
00213 
00214   while (I2CM_Transfer.Locked);
00215   while (I2C_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_FLAG_BUSBUSY));
00216 
00217   I2CM_Transfer.Buffer = NULL;
00218 
00219   return (u32)I2CM_Transfer.Status;
00220 }
00221 
00222 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00223  * @brief   I2C master write data to I2C slave.
00224  * @retval  None
00225  ************************************************************************************************************/
00226 u32 I2CM_BufferWrite(u16 dev, u8 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count)
00227 {
00228   I2CM_Transfer.RegAddr     = word_addr;
00229   I2CM_Transfer.Buffer      = data;
00230   I2CM_Transfer.Length      = count;
00231   I2CM_Transfer.Counter     = 0;
00232   I2CM_Transfer.Direction   = I2CM_DIRECTION_OUT;
00233   I2CM_Transfer.DevAddr     = dev;
00234   I2CM_Transfer.Locked      = TRUE;
00235   I2CM_Transfer.RetryDownCounter = I2CM_BUS_MAX_RETRY;
00236 
00237   /* Send I2C START                                                                                         */
00238   I2C_TargetAddressConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2CM_Transfer.DevAddr, I2C_MASTER_WRITE);
00239 
00240   while (I2CM_Transfer.Locked);
00241   while (I2C_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_FLAG_BUSBUSY));
00242 
00243   I2CM_Transfer.Buffer = NULL;
00244 
00245   return (u32)I2CM_Transfer.Status;
00246 }
00247 
00248 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00249  * @brief   Read and write EEPROM to confirm I2C master transfer status.
00250  * @retval  None
00251  ************************************************************************************************************/
00252 void EEPROM_WriteReadTest(void)
00253 {
00254   if (I2CM_BufferWrite(EEPROM_ADDRESS, 0x00, (u8*)TestData, 16) != I2CM_OK)
00255   {
00256     /* Write fail                                                                                           */
00257     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00258     while (1);
00259   }
00260   if (I2CM_BufferRead(EEPROM_ADDRESS, 0x00, ReadBuffer, 16) != I2CM_OK)
00261   {
00262     /* Read fail                                                                                            */
00263     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00264     while (1);
00265   }
00266 }

00273   * @retval None
00274   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00275 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00276 {
00277   /*
00278      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00279      Debug message can be added here.
00280      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00281   */
00282 
00283   while (1)
00284   {
00285   }
00286 }
00287 #endif
